actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to exempt from Federal income taxation certain nonprofit corporations all of whose members are tax-exempt credit unions.

summary.text: Exempts from Federal income taxation, under the Internal Revenue Code, a corporation organized and operated for mutual purposes and without profit for the purpose of providing, either or both, reserve funds for, and insurance of, shares and deposits in credit unions which have no capital stock and are organized and operated for mutual purposes and not for profit.

titles.title: A bill to exempt from Federal income taxation certain nonprofit corporations all of whose members are tax-exempt credit unions.
